What is the law of inertia?
Answer: An object at rest will remain at rest| and an object in motion will remain in motion with a constant velocity| unless acted upon by a net external force.
Distractor1: For every action| there is an equal and opposite reaction.
Distractor2: The force acting on an object is equal to the mass of the object times its acceleration.
